Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
01.08.2013 SH SCR18303 BXA020K: Added again check on document type when checking for ARCH record
22.07.2013 AS SCR#18303 removed check on document type when chacking for ARCH record
11.06.2013 GB SCR18203 BXA020K: Extended test for check if row exists in ARCHIVE
05.02.2013 AS SCR#17809 added parameter pi.language to GB335
09.01.2013 AS SCR#17809 Due to problems they cause with Tamino we convert PDF v1.5 files to 1.6 before we do merge them to XML
19.12.2012 SH SCR16998 In case of problems with Radiant BXA020 is no longer turning to MSGW, the job is ended
immediately without creation of final XML and set TX20_ARCH_ERRORCOUNT+1
02.12.2012 AS SCR#17658 fixed problems reported by syntax checker
30.08.2011 SH SCR16697 BXA020K Added logic to create XML after 30. retry
although not all documents are scanned (new field TX20_ARCH_ERRORCOUNT)
25.05.2011 SH SCR16475 BXA020B Changed output of total lines and removed
parts to write bankcosts and special storno text to XML
02.05.2011 SH SCR16387 BXA020B Replaced BPH122 by GB902
23.03.2011 GB SCR116261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
25.02.2011 SH SCR16233 BXA020F/G Added DEBC_DEBC to output
23.01.2011 GB SCR16161 Extended expresion which used for write one row
For every selected DRAFT (BXA020F/G)
20.01.2011 SH SCR16057 Added modules BXA020F/G for drafts and renamed module
BXA020F into BXA020K (Get scan from archive)
10.07.2008 AS SCR13672 fixed missing locate for GSET access
07.07.2008 SH SCR13764 BXA020F Added test on existing ARCH rows, if not exists
the whole XML is aborted
26.06.2008 SH SCR13737 BXA020A Replaced GNRL_ACTIVEDATE by REPA_DATE
19.06.2008 AS SCR13672 Using GB730B if GSET(7004)=Y
25.03.2008 AK SCR13485 print report in client language
18.03.2008 SH SCR13425 BXA020A Changed conent of second headerline in case
BXA020D was performed
25.02.2008 SH SCR13425 BXA020D Changed output total amount in client currency
02.10.2007 SH SCR12159 BXA020F Extended content of <page> element
24.01.2007 SH SCR12159 Added module BXA020F - Scans from archive
11.10.2005 SH SCR9180 BXA020B Extended program to write remaining charaters of
BDPD_DESCRIPTION if more than 30 charaters exists
19.08.2005 SH SCR8887 BXA020B Fixed bug with v.AMOUNT if
GNRL_BANKCOSTSPOLICY = false
on 15.8.2005 WJ SCR8807 head line extended
//15.09.2004 EE SCR6991 new special text BXA020B_BADP
19.08.2004 SH SCR6712 Activated BXA020DEV, see previous remark and SCR
06.08.2004 SH SCR6712 Remove page handling, will be doen now by Software Ag
- the same as in BXA030
19.05.2004 SH SCR6217 Removed part 'Call BXA054', handled now by BPH102
06.05.2004 SH SCR6174 Added second header line to BXA020C/D/E
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
15.01.2004 SG SCR5161 BXA020B Write special text to XML if BADP_BANKSTORNO = Y
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
09.12.2003 SH SCR4909 BXA020D Added printing of one total line with bankcosts if
. PI.TX20_AMOUNTHELLERCOSTSCLIENTCURR <> 0. at the end
06.10.2003 SH SCR4473 Minimized the length of bank-/clientname for make sure
- that the date will be printed in every case, relevant for BXA020B - E
12.08.2003 SH SCR4079 BXA020F Send for every selected COUT row a file with
- BXA054
05.08.2003 SH SCR4035 Skipped argument PI.Printerqueue for call to BXA900 if
- there is a COUT row in database.
01.08.2003 SH SCR4020 Added BANK.BANK_NAME to line "BANK" in BXA020B
04.07.2003 RR SCR3944 Added Handler to ignore record-locking
02.07.2003 SH SCR3886 BXA020A Replaced DATE() with GRNL_ACTIVEDATE

- in tag

Payments/Cheuqes
27.06.2003 SH SCR3877 BXA020C Print BDPD with BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE = 1
- if BTCP_DEBH_NO = 0 and BTCP_BADP_ID > 0
17.06.2003.SH SCR3791 BXA020C Print BDPD lines after the clientinfos
11.06.2003 SH SCR3721 Added new part BXA020E
28.05.2003 SH SCR3633 BXA020B_BADP Implemented call to BPH122 to calculate
- the exchange differences which will be written to XML as total line
06.05.2003 SH SCR3477 BXA020C Print last line only if BTCH_DELCREDEREPAYMENT = Y
17.04.2003 SH SCR3358 BXA022C Used BTCP_BANK_LEDG_NO instead of
- BTCP_DEBH_NO to obtain table DEBH, bug fixed.
15.04.2003 SH SCR3305 BXA022C Print "Delcredere payment - see letter" as last
- line
24.03.2003 SH SCR3167 BXA020D_CHQE Select CHQE with CHQE_CHQU_ID instead
- of CHQE_ID, now more then one rows will be printed to XML, therefore the hole
- logic of BXA020D had to be changed.
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added two new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
06.11.2002 SCR2493 SH Add new Link to GPRQ and send GPRQ_PRINTERQUEUE
- as last argument to BXA900
06.11.2002 SH Set pageskip after 67 lines now
05.11.2002 SH BXA022C --> Added new tag <page-skip/> to produce a pageskip
- after 68 lines and print the pageheader and columntitle informations for each
- page
22.10.2002 SCR2397 SH BXA020B Add second headerline with "Bank" and "Journal" to
- report
//22.10.2002 SH SCR2393 Add new argument to end of list for call to BXA900
//10-10-2002 JP SCR#2156 add parameter po.DeletionAllowed for BXACALL
07.10.2002 SH BXA0202B Used v.AMOUNT instead of BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR, see new SPEC
25.09.2002 SH Extended BXA020B to print the bankcosts
24.09.2002 SH BXA020C --> Changed text in headerline to "Cheques client"
23.09.2002 SCR2228 SH Call BXA054 only if BADP_BANKFILETYPE > 0
19.09.2002 SH widened the outputfrom with 1 to 80
18.09.2002 SCR2205 SH Write all detaillines into one CDATA section
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
general settings ...
-- Uses only for testing purposes
... Test BXA020B
... Test BXA020C
... Test BXA020D
... Test BXA020E
-- End of testing area
read general settings ....
-- Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES
... Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
... get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
... directory for templates
... directory for temporary XML Files
Set language back
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Used for BXA020B
-- Used for BXA020K Scans from archive
set report language to client language
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
... set trigger to handle archived documents
... delete temp table to make sure that table is empty
-- Prepare end tags, independently from further BXA020 modules
-- BXA020K Scans from archive
... only if all documents are successfully scanned, else the XML has not to be
created, until all documents are scanned or it's the 30. retry then XML has
to be created with those documents whch are scanned
-- Stop / abort creation of XML, because not all documents are scanned until now
which have to be added to XML in BXA020K (only if scanning was set for one of
BADP / BTCP / CHEQ rows)
... produce Header parts (Detail lines have to be produced first, because in
these modules the header line for the report are prepared)
-- Prodcuce final XML
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Allow deletion of the temporary record in BXACALL
@ TX20 has not to be removed, if not all documents are scanned until now
which have to be added to XML in BXA020F (only if scanning was set for one of
BADP / BTCP / CHEQ rows)
-- COLUMN 1
-- COLUMN 2
-- COLUMN 3
-- COLUMN 4
-- Dummy fields only used to get fixed positions they are in every case blank
-- Write total line(s)
... in bank currency
... in client currency (if <> bank currency)
.. calculate sequencenumber which has to printed to XML
... amount which has to be printed
-- Prepare header lines for BXA020A
-- Print BADP detail line
-- Following Lines
... description type 1
... description type 3
... description type 2
... print one blank row after every BADP row
-- Build totals for footer-information
-- Store HYPA_ID of scanned documents, uses in BXA020K "Scans from archive"
-- Reset virtual
-- Write extra line if BDPD_DESCRIPTION > 30 characters
.. characters from 31 until 60
.. characters from 61 until 80
-- Write extra line if BDPD_DESCRIPTION > 30 characters
.. characters from 31 until 60
.. characters from 61 until 80
-- Write extra line if BDPD_DESCRIPTION > 30 characters
.. characters from 31 until 60
.. characters from 61 until 80
-- Write extra line if BDPD_DESCRIPTION > 30 characters
.. characters from 31 until 60
.. characters from 61 until 80
-- HEADERLINE
-- COLUMN 1
-- COLUMN 2
-- COLUMN 3
-- COLUMN 4
-- Dummy fields only used to get fixed positions they are in every case blank
-- Total amounts, used to print at the end of the list, see T.S.
- Calculate sequencenumber which has to printed to XML
-- Prepare Header line uses in BXA020A
-- Print 1. Line
-- "Auftraggeber" with BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE = 1
-- "Applikation" with BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE = 2
-- Print one blank row after each BADP row
-- Build totals for footer-information
-- Store HYPA_ID of scanned documents, uses in BXA020K "Scans from archive"
-- Reset virtual
-- COLUMN 1
-- COLUMN 2
-- COLUMN 3
-- FOOTER
-- Dummy fields only used to get fixed positions they are in every case blank
-- Total amounts, used to print at the end of the list, see T.S.
-- Write totals in GNRL_CURRENCY
... and in CLIENT_CURRENCY
-- Write bankcosts if exists
- Calculate sequencenumber which has to printed to XML
-- Prepare header line uses in BXA020A
-- Print current Detailline
-- Build totals for footer-information
-- Store HYPA_ID of scanned documents, uses in BXA020K "Scans from archive"
-- COLUMN 1
-- COLUMN 2
-- COLUMN 3
-- FOOTER
-- Dummy fields only used to get fixed positions they are in every case blank
- Calculate sequencenumber which has to printed to XML
-- Prepare header line uses in BXA020A
-- Print individual cheuqes
-- Print bank costs that are calculated by Heller
-- Store HYPA_ID of scanned documents, uses in BXA020K "Scans from archive"
-- Dummy fields only used to get fixed positions they are in every case blank
-- Prepare header line used in BXA020A
-- Print row with total amount
-- Calculate sequencenumber which has to printed to XML
-- Print drafts
... calculate totals
-- Store HYPA_ID of scanned documents, uses in BXA020K "Scans from archive"
-- Dummy fields only used to get fixed positions they are in every case blank
-- Prepare header line used in BXA020A
-- Print row with total amount
-- Calculate sequencenumber which has to printed to XML
-- Print drafts
... calculate totals
-- Store HYPA_ID of scanned documents, uses in BXA020K "Scans from archive"
-- Get number of retries with errors (not all documents are scanned)
-- Update number of retries with errors (not all documents are scanned)
-- Radiant has not to be accessed for files with doc extension = MSG or CVS or HTM
... if at least one document is not scanned the creation of XML has to be
skipped until all documents are scanned
Exception: At the 30. try the XML has to be created with only those documents
which are scanned
(No error indication for files with doc extension = MSG or CVS or HTM)

ExpSyntax.val: {0,8} AND Upper({0,7})<>'MSG' AND Upper({0,7})<>'CSV' AND Upper({0,7})<>'HTM'

Text.val: -- Prepare temp files with <page> and </page>, uses to include a file from
UFB588RA
-- Reset variables
-- Get scanned (base64 encoded) image in XML <page> elements ...
-- For the moment there exists no detailed error handling, in case of at least
one error the job ends immediately and set TX20_ARCH_ERRORCOUNT+ 1
-- Concat XML <page> element and deleted <page> element
09.01.2013 AS SCR#17809 Tamino causes trouble with older PDF file versions (1.5). So if the version is 1.5 we do convert it to
1.6 here. Possible errors we do ignore here. If the conversion fails the original file will be inserted into the XML.
... write <page>
... add scanned document
... write </page>

ExpSyntax.val: 'UFB558RA was not able to generate and fill base64 encoded image data. (Errorcode = '&Trim (Str ({0,7},'N9'))
